title: Macho Lyrics in Tamil From Mersal
stanzas:
maacho ennaacho
aval touch-chittaa
uyir into two aacho.

maacho match aacho
aval speak-ittaal
kuyil keecho

dream-il hug-gitten
love shower aacho
bp ponaen
sogam loose aacho

galaa galaa galaa
nee classy
galaa galaa galaa
naa maassy
oh...

look at you see
click a classy
thinking paarthaen
you are my daisy

icy doll-a saanjaa
kannu whistle-uthadi.
en morning flash-ah
shiny pol nee.

caramel azhaga
tasty paakkuren di
nee smily ponaa
girly gaali.

three much-aah
missitten
ennavida unna
love-itten

un heart-u kulla naan
love rabit aayitten
veli varaamaal
... poven..

uyir into two aacho.

sweeta ponen

float aanaen

melody-a tweeturen

treaturen
